column1: Test Cases of User Registration Feature

column2: Verify that user is navigated to register page
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
column5: User should navigate to Create Account page.

column2: Verify that user is getting error message of password fields minimum characters
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
4. Enter Email Id and Password, Confirm Password with 4 characters
5. Click on Register button
column5: User should get error message for minimum characters validation for password fields.

column2: Verify that user is unable to register with mismatch password and confirm password
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
4. Enter Email Id and mismatch Password and Confirm Password 
5. Click on Register button
column5: User should get error message for mismatch Password and Confirm Password fields.

column2: Verify that user is able to verify email for registered user if email verification flow is required
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check email verification flow is required or not
2. Check verification email to above registered email id 
3. Click on verification link or copy paste on link on browser 
4. If email verification flow is optional or disabled then assert message
column5: User should able to verify received verification email successfully with required email verification flow.

column2: Verify that user is able to register with valid data
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
4. Enter Email Id, Password, Confirm Password and other displayed fields
5. Click on Register button 
6. Verify notification message displayed on page if email verification is required
7. If email verification is optional/disabled then check profile page and logout from application
column5: User should able to register with entered data and notification message should display for verification of email.

column2: Verify that user is unable to register with already registered user
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
4. Enter already registered Email Id, new Password, Confirm Password and other displayed fields
5. Click on Register button
column5: User should not able to register with already registered Email Id and error message should display for same.

column2: Verify that user is unable to register with invalid Email Id
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
4. Enter invalid Email Id, valid Password, Confirm Password and other displayed fields
5. Click on Register button
column5: User should not able to register with invalid Email Id and error message should display for same.

column2: Verify that user is unable to register with blank data
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Check that Login button displaying on page
3. Click on Create Account link displaying on page
4. Leave all fields blank
5. Click on Register button
column5: Error validation message should display for all required fields.
